articles.title: MASSIVE solar storm to strike Earth, Venus and Mars, reveals NASA; Know the DANGER - HT Tech
articles.description: A massive coronal mass ejection (CME) cloud is likely to hit Venus, Mars as well as the Earth, NASA model has shown. While the first two planets will face the brunt of the solar storm, Earth can be hit by glancing blows.
articles.content: On June 20, an X1.1-class solar flare erupted on the Sun, making it one of the biggest explosions seen this year. The flare sparked a shortwave radio blackout across North America that affected wirel… [+2342 chars]

articles.title: Apple Vision Pro gets new developer tools; will bring apps to life in ways never seen before - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple has made visionOS’s software development kit (SDK) available to the developer community. It will enable developers to build spatial experience-focused apps for the Apple Vision Pro.
articles.content: On June 5, the annual Apple Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) began, and its keynote session was headlined by the unveiling of the newest Apple product, the Apple Vision Pro. This new headset co… [+2137 chars]

articles.title: BepiColombo's Space Odyssey: Third Mercury Flyby Reveals Geological Wonders - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The ESA/JAXA BepiColombo mission has made its third of six gravity assist flybys at Mercury, snapping images of a newly named impact crater as well as tectonic and volcanic curiosities as it adjusts its trajectory for entering Mercury orbit in 2025. The close…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)June 21, 2023

articles.title: Five latest advancements in osteoporosis research - Labiotech.eu
articles.description: Take a look at five of the latest advancements in osteoporosis research - a condition that causes your bones to weaken and break easily.
